p: The two main components of TTO, terpinen-4-ol (35.88%) and γ-terpinene (19.65%), were also evaluated against the T. rubrum SL 171/13 strain ( Table 2). The data revealed that terpinen-4-ol showed a lower MIC value (0.06%, v/ v) than γ-terpinene (MIC = 0.5%, v/ v) and TTO (MIC = 0.12%, v/ v). ( Table 2).
